plans.title: Choose Your Plan

cancel.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
cancel.answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time from the subscription management page. Access to paid features will remain until the end of the paid period.

change.question: Can I change my plan?
change.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will take effect immediately or in the next billing cycle.

refund.question: Are refunds available?
refund.answer: We offer refunds within 14 days of purchase. Contact support for more information.
